name: Shady Bluebird Meadows: Slim Edition
description:
Welcome to Shady Bluebird Meadows! Play as a bluebird dodging and weaving your way through a series of inconveniently placed old fence posts, and see how nimble you are!

this game is a flappy bird clone and represents my first attempt at using unity ever. this might actually be the most unfunny and obnoxious piece of media on the internet ever, and this is a world in which the annoying orange existed.

now you may think to yourself, "roachie, if this game is so poorly made and overall unfun, then why even upload it to itch?" which is fair. I also thought that, actually. but then I thought it might be fun to use this platform as a sort of public diary in which I can record my growth in game development (assuming I don't become uninterested and stop doing it completely).

(there is a rough draft in the zip as well; the actual final game is labeled sbm slim edition)
